content: A gargantuan Yaoguai Toad, Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang will waste no time leaping into battle with a powerful slam attack from the air. While he doesn’t have many moves, they can often land extremely quickly, which means you’ll need to be ready to dodge at any moment.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
A gargantuan Yaoguai Toad, Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang will waste no time leaping into battle with a powerful slam attack from the air. While he doesn’t have many moves, they can often land extremely quickly, which means you’ll need to be ready to dodge at any moment.
